CHAT.comment: Time is 14:52. Video tape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio

For the most part Mot and Chi play separately although they are right next to one another. They each work on their own constructions which they then show to the other. There is some talk about which objects are magnetized but little talk about why or how objects stick to one another.

u.a: explains the activity and that she will videotape it but will be focusing on their hands
whispered
video starts here
MOT and Chi are seated on the floor with the magnets on the floor between them; black base is empty and the objects are on a pile on the floor beside it
picks up plastic turtle and touches it to black base
touches horseshoe magnet to a washer; it sticks
touches horseshoe magnet to ball
balances the blue plastic teddy bear on the back of the turtle
picks up blue arrow magnet and uses it to pick up a washer
hands silver stick to Mot
stands silver stick up on yellow wand then knocks it over with her hand
attempts to stand up a silver man on the black base
indicates the flat face of the man as contrasted to his feet
places silver man in standing position and lets go so that he falls over
puts a silver man flat on the black base
points to silver man she has just put down
pulls silver man slightly off the edge of the black base; he still sticks
picks up a nickel and tries to stick it to the black base
has placed a silver ball on the black base and pushes it with her finger so that it moves some but then rolls back and sticks
uses horseshoe magnet to pick up a washer on each end; holds it out toward Mot
moves horseshoe magnet with washers closer to Mot
rolls silver ball off black base
picks up red magnet ball and puts it on black base
picks up yellow wand which has several objects stuck to it
picks up black base which now has four magnet balls on it and moves the magnet balls with her fingers
picks up plastic turtle
moves horseshoe magnet toward plastic teddy
pushes coins and plastic teddy away
puts blue arrow magnet on the yellow wand and picks up the wand
points with wand
holds up wand with blue arrow on it
puts silver circle on the floor and drops a paper clip onto it; then picks up silver circle; paper clip slides off
takes silver circle out of Chi's hand
picks up yellow wand and sticks paper clips to it
attempts to balence the silver circle on top of the silver stick which is standing up on the black base
picks up silver cicle and holds it above black base; a silver man sticks to it

g.ga: silver man stuck to silver circle

u.a: silver man falls back to black base
repeats the action of picking up silver man with silver circle
Chi is holding up the yellow wand which has several objects dangling from it; Chi points to these
moves a silver man on the wand so that his hands are stuck to a silver stick that is dangling from the yellow wand
moves man so that his feet are stuck to the silver stick instead of his hands
holds silver circle over black base again
Chi's hands are blocking what she is doing
holds up silver circle with a silver man dangling from the end of it
attempts to stand up two silver sticks on the yellow wand but they fall over
stands up one silver stick on the yellow wand
moves second silver stick towards yellow wand and taps the surface of the wand with it; the first silver stick that had been standing falls over
holds up silver circle with two silver men sticking to it
mumbled
an object falls from the yellow wand which Chi holds in the air
pushes the balls on the black base; they move and then slide back into place
holds up yellow wand with a silver stick and a silver man dangling from it
silver ball
attempts to place silver ball inside a nut on the black base
picks up another silver man with the objects that are already dangling from the end of the yellow wand
continues to put nuts under the balls on the black base
indicates the balls in the nuts on the black base
attempts to put a washer on top of one of the balls; the washer falls off the side of the ball
attempts to place a washer on top of another ball; it falls
holds up yellow wand with silver circle stuck to it
pulls silver circle off wand
moves silver circle toward wand
continues to move silver circle toward wand; they stick to one another
pulls silver cirlce and wand apart; moves them together and acts as if she is putting her nose between them
picks up horseshoe magnet and tries to use it to pick up a washer; after several tries it works
puts a silver man on the bottom of the yellow wand and attempts to stick the silver circle to the feet of the silver man
succeeds in her attempts to stick silver circle to silver man's feet
places construction on floor; it remains intact
attempts to stand a silver man on top of yellow wand; construction falls apart
